errorNotFound: [text-red-500]Command "{}" not found. Try typing "help" for a list of available commands.
errorGoArgument: [text-red-500]Please give a section to jump to <home|resume|projects>.
errorLinkArgument: [text-red-500]Please give an external site to link to <github|linkedin>.
terminalHelp: Try typing "help" for a list of available commands.
helpCommand:
[text-blue-500]  - link <github|linkedin>: open a given external link
  - go <home|projects|resume|about-me>: navigate to a given section
  - get <resume>: download or open a given file, depending on browser
  - help: show a list of available commands
  - clear: clear all terminal text
  - game: start the text adventure game 'Awakening Quest'

construction: This is my experimental personal site, featuring a fun interactive terminal built with web technologies. It's still under construction, but feel free to play around with the current version.
cute: You found the secret command! You're probably very smart and really cute :)

game.gameNoAction: [text-green-500]That is not a valid action, try something else.
game.helpCommand:
[text-green-500]  - quit: quit game and return to the normal terminal
  - restart: restart the game from the beginning
  - hint: give a hint for the current action to take
  - help: show a list of available game commands
  - clear: clear all terminal text
